summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Neighborhood Parks, Green Spaces, Trails, and Zoo Levy; authorizing the acquisition of real property at 606 NW 76th Street; authorizing the acceptance of the deed for open space, park and recreation purposes; and increasing appropriations from the 2000 Parks Levy Fund in the 2003 Budget of the Department of Parks and Recreation; all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
